### Bio

Alexander Ek is a Research Fellow in the [Department of Econometrics and Business Statistics](https://www.monash.edu/business/econometrics-and-business-statistics) at [Monash University](https://www.monash.edu/), and an Associate Investigator at [OPTIMA](https://optima.org.au/).
In 2022, He received his PhD degree in computer science from Monash University.
Most of his research centers around combinatorial optimisation, data-driven decision-making under uncertainty, election integrity and auditing, and combining statistics and optimisation.
